item.title: Welcome to Peter Pan's Techland
item.description: Welcome to Peter Pan's Techland - my personal space for documenting the journey of building intelligent systems that bridge cloud and edge.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Peter Pan's Techland - my personal space for documenting the journey of building intelligent systems that bridge cloud and edge.

What to Expectâ€‹

This site will feature:

  • Projects: End-to-end builds from hardware to cloud deployment
  • Guides: Reusable tutorials for AWS, edge devices, and AI/ML
  • Workshops: Hands-on materials for community events
  • Blog: Thoughts, learnings, and experiences along the way

My Focusâ€‹

I work at the intersection of three exciting areas:

  1. AI & Machine Learning - Amazon Bedrock, Nova models, edge inference
  2. Edge Computing - ESP32, Raspberry Pi, Jetson, and more
  3. AWS Cloud Services - IoT Core, Greengrass, Lambda, and beyond

Stay Connectedâ€‹

  • Follow me on GitHub for code
  • Check out the Projects section for builds
  • Dive into Guides for tutorials

Let's build something amazing together! ðŸš€
